movies.title: The Graduates
movies.plot: The love story of two tenth-graders in Romania before the revolution.
movies.simplePlot: The love story of two tenth-graders in Romania before the revolution.

biography.bio: Stefan Banica Jr. was born on October 18, 1967 in Bucharest, Romania. He is an actor and director, known for The Graduates (1986), Ho Ho Ho (2009) and Liceenii Rock 'n' Roll (1992). He has been married to Andreea Marin since January 2006. He was previously married to Mihaela Radulescu.
biography.name: Stefan Banica Jr.

biography.bio: Mihai Constantin was born on September 30, 1964 in Bucharest, Romania. He is an actor, known for If I Want to Whistle, I Whistle (2010), De ce eu? (2015) and The Graduates (1986).
biography.name: Mihai Constantin

biography.bio: Oana Sîrbu was born on May 13, 1968 in Bucharest, Romania. She is an actress, known for The Graduates (1986), Liceenii Rock 'n' Roll (1992) and Liceenii în alerta (1993).
biography.name: Oana Sîrbu

biography.bio: Cesonia Postelnicu is an actress, known for The Graduates (1986), Liceenii Rock 'n' Roll (1992) and Liceenii în alerta (1993).
biography.name: Cesonia Postelnicu

biography.bio: Tudor Petrut writes, acts and directs. He has several full-length feature screenplays on the market. From his beginnings as a child actor in his native Romania, Petrut went on to receive formal training in theater, film and television at the prestigious Theater and Film Art Institute in Bucharest. As a film actor, Petrut was awarded a Diploma ACIN - the Romanian equivalent of the Academy Award - for his role in The Graduates (1986). In the arena of theater, Petrut directed such classics as "Death of a Salesman", "Waiting for Godot", "Love's Labour's Lost" for Romanian repertory theaters and "The Two Gentlemen of Verona" for Magnolia Playhouse in Hollywood, and a modern play for the Long Beach Playhouse. As an accredited Los Angeles-based foreign press correspondent, Petrut writes a weekly column on Hollywood and California arts and culture for several Romanian publications. He has served as a Romanian history, art and language consultant for Columbia Pictures' "Bram Stoker's Dracula", and overseas production consultant for Kiper-Lascu and Perpetual Motion Films. Tudor is the host of the weekly radio show "The Hollywood Minute" on Radio Romania at Timisoara.
biography.name: Tudor Petrut

biography.bio: Tamara Buciuceanu-Botez was born on August 10, 1929 in Tighina, Moldova. She is an actress, known for Papa vient dimanche (2012), Liceenii Rock 'n' Roll (1992) and Au diable Staline, vive les mariés! (2008).
biography.name: Tamara Buciuceanu-Botez

biography.bio: Ion Caramitru was born on March 9, 1942 in Bucharest, Romania. He is an actor, known for Amen (2002), Mission: Impossible (1996) and Charlie Countryman (2013).
biography.name: Ion Caramitru

biography.bio: Silviu Stanculescu was born on January 24, 1932 in Timisoara, Timis, Romania. He was an actor, known for No Trespassing (1975), Vifornita (1973) and The Graduates (1986). He died on October 23, 1998 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Silviu Stanculescu

biography.bio: Dorina Lazar was born on November 7, 1940 in Romania. She is an actress, known for Bucharest Non Stop (2015), Bless You, Prison (2002) and Saint Ange (2004).
biography.name: Dorina Lazar

biography.bio: Sebastian Papaiani was born on August 25, 1936 in Pitesti, Arges, Romania. He was an actor, known for Brigada Diverse intrã în actiune (1970), Pacala (1974) and B.D. in alert (1971). He was married to Eugenia Giurgiu-Papaiani. He died on September 27, 2016 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Sebastian Papaiani

biography.bio: Cristina Deleanu was born on December 25, 1940 in Bucharest, Romania. She is an actress, known for Anotimpul iubirii (1987), Actiunea Zuzuc (1985) and Orgolii (1982).
biography.name: Cristina Deleanu

biography.bio: Iarina Demian is an actress, known for The Graduates (1986), Sanda (1990) and Fata în fata (1999).
biography.name: Iarina Demian

biography.bio: Liviu Craciun is known for his work on The Graduates (1986), The Earth's Most Beloved Son (1993) and Saint Nicked (2010).
biography.name: Liviu Craciun

biography.bio: Mihai Mereuta was born on November 29, 1924 in Santa Mare, Botosani, Romania. He was an actor, known for Ora zero (1979), Iancu Jianu, zapciul (1980) and The Punishment (1976). He died on April 1, 2003 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Mihai Mereuta

biography.bio: Catalin Paduraru is an actor, known for Liceenii Rock 'n' Roll (1992), The Graduates (1986) and Le fusil de bois (1994).
biography.name: Catalin Paduraru
